Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Cube Name (wildcard * and/or cube1 & cube2 list)

Parameters.Name: pView
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: View name to be cleared (uses pFilter if pView not specified else clears entire cube)

Parameters.Name: pFilter
Parameters.Prompt: Optional but ignored if view is specified: Year¦ 2006 + 2007 & Scenario¦ Actual + Budget & Organization¦ North America Operations

Parameters.Name: pFilterParallel
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Parallelization Filter: Month:Q1+Q2+Q3+Q4 (Blank=run single threaded). Single dimension parallel slices. Will be added to filter single element at a time. Dimension must not be part of filter

Parameters.Name: pParallelThreads
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Ignored if pFilterParallel is empty. Maximum number of threads to run when parallel processing is enabled ( if <2 will execute one thread, but parallel filter is still applied )

Parameters.Name: pDimDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of Dimension/Element set  (default value if blank = '&')

Parameters.Name: pEleStartDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of element list  (default value if blank = '¦')

Parameters.Name: pEleDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between elements (default value if blank = '+')

Parameters.Name: pCubeLogging
Parameters.Prompt: Required: Cube Logging (0 = No transaction logging, 1 = Logging of transactions, 2 = Ignore Cube Logging - No Action Taken)

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Make Views and subsets Temporary (1=Temporary)

Parameters.Name: pSandbox
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: To use sandbox not base data enter the sandbox name (invalid name will result in process error)

Parameters.Name: pSubN
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Create N level subset for all dims not mentioned in pFilter
